about_the_game:
Telekinesis & Abilities

Harness the power of our dynamic telekinesis system, allowing you to tactically manipulate the environment to defeat its inhabitants. Several unique telekinetic abilities are at your disposal to approach challenges the way you want. Want to turn your enemies into objects that can be thrown at their allies? Find the Pacify ability. Through experimentation and creativity, you may be the first to reach the progenitor, human.

Enemy Encounters

From a glance, creatures residing in the Human Restoration Program appear to be recreations of harmless creatures found on Earth. Foolish human, this isn’t Earth! The Zylphi designed each creature type to have its own deadly set of telekinetic abilities, and all share one mission: to destroy every last human! Enemies can even interact with each other, leading to intimidating or comedic twists that other players may have missed.

Physics-based Interactivity

Along your voyage deep into the cave systems of Incuratus, you will come across a wide assortment of object types for you to physically manipulate. Push minecarts through treacherous ruins, throw boulders at your foes, and even push lamps to see through the darkest caves. Each object type is a tool for you to master.

Inventory Management

Shape your character to fit your playstyle with our distinctive inventory system that requires exploration and optimization to create the perfect build for you. Using upgrade blocks with a range of shapes, sizes and power levels you may decide to focus on your character’s movement speed, health, carry weight, pull speed, or a balance of all of them. Just make sure you’re making the most of the space you have!

Bell & Ringo

Meet the two most prized residents of the Human Restoration Program, Bell & Ringo! Find Bell & Ringo’s shops within the program’s cave systems and trade your hard-earned upgrade blocks for their exclusive abilities!

Story

Beneath the Surface,

Reach the Crystals,

Enlighten the Darkness,

Ascend the Tower,

Amidst the Fog,

The Progenitor Resides

As you pursue the progenitor, learn more about the outside world as two alien civilizations with deep-rooted animosity and opposing beliefs clash to obtain what they desire from the program. Meanwhile, the contained world of the Human Restoration Program also proves to harness trouble, as a depraved foe seeks to turn the program into their utopia while keeping it running for eternity.

name: THE OUTREACH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Welcome Human-V1399 to the "Human Restoration Program," the final hope for the rebirth of mankind. In this physics-based movement shooter, use telekinetic powers to defeat hostile alien-built creatures through the depths of an irradiated planet in a conflict-ridden solar system.
